meanings.sent1: The neurines in the brain help us think and feel.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study neurines to understand how our nerves work.
meanings.sent3: The neurines in the body are like messengers delivering important information.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced like neurines firing in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The neurines in the spinal cord transmit signals for movement and sensation.

meanings.definition: A substance found in nerve tissue.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching the neurines to develop new treatments.
meanings.sent2: Neurines play a crucial role in the communication between nerves.
meanings.sent3: The neurines in the lab were glowing under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: His words were like neurines, sparking understanding in everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The neurines in the body act as messengers, sending signals to the brain.
